## We’re excited to be in Pittsburgh for PyCon 2025!

You can find the Posit team in the Community Booths at [**Booth #523**](https://us.pycon.org/2025/attend/expo-hall/){target="_blank"},
and we’d love for you to stop by, say hi, and catch up on the exciting things we’ve been building.



## Giveaway!

**Speaking of exciting:**
We’re giving away 10 signed copies of
[Python Polars: The Definitive Guide](https://polarsguide.com/){target="_blank"},
co-authored by our very own
[Jeroen Janssens](https://jeroenjanssens.com/){target="_blank"} and
[Thijs Nieuwdorp](https://www.linkedin.com/in/thijsnieuwdorp/){target="_blank"}
— swing by our booth and enter for a chance to win!

Whether you want to talk Python, check out a quick demo, or just grab some great swag, we hope you’ll come see us.
